analyzed: āgamya ca sāyantanam aśanam saṃgatya mātuḥ mānasam ānandena vitatya praśasta vastra mālā alaṃkāra sāram

original: parikṛtya sakhibhir ātmānaṃ parivṛtya sarva-bhāgavata-śiva-pradasya bhāgavata-paramparā-parama-guroḥ
analyzed: parikṛtya sakhibhiḥ ātmānam parivṛtya sarva bhāgavata śiva pradasya bhāgavata paramparā parama guroḥ

original: śivasya varivasyāyāṃ śiva-rātri-yātribhiḥ pitrādibhir ekāgratayā sva-maṅgala-kṛte
analyzed: śivasya varivasyāyām pitṛ ādibhiḥ ekāgra tayā sva maṅgala kṛte
kṛta jāgaram svīya parakīya rājakīya janakīya bahala kolāhala prakāram śiva āgāram
anu nānā vidyā vismāyaka tayā vidyamānān saṃpaśyati sma

adhidevaḥ iva adīpyat hanyaḥ parjanya nandanaḥ

original: [13] prabhāte ca prabhāte vadānyatā-pracārāhṛta-viprādīnām agaṇeya-gaṇāya guṇa-guṇitānnādi-dānataḥ
analyzed: prabhāte ca prabhāte vadānya tā pracāra āhṛta vipra ādīnām agaṇeya gaṇāya guṇa guṇita anna ādi dānataḥ

original: saṃmānataś ca vitānita-yaśasi śrī-vrajarāja-sadasi teṣu tat-tīrtha-yātri-śateṣu ca
analyzed: saṃmānataḥ ca vitānita yaśasi śrī vrajarāja sadasi teṣu tad tīrtha yātri śateṣu ca

original: tasyām amāvasyāyāṃ tāsminn eva vraja-vasatibhiḥ saha pitṛbhyāṃ lālitaḥ sa harir vāsateyīm uvāsa /
analyzed: tasyām amāvasyāyām eva vraja vasatibhiḥ saha pitṛbhyām lālitaḥ sa hariḥ vāsateyīm uvāsa

original: [14] tataḥ sā ca rātrir yātrika-jana-prācurya-pūryamāṇā nāsīd iti kolāhalāpagamena hyastana-jāgara-klamena ca suptiḥ sarvataś ca nirbharam  #
analyzed: tatas sā ca rātriḥ yātrika jana prācurya pūryamāṇā na āsīt iti kolāhala apagamena hyastana jāgara klamena ca suptiḥ sarvatas ca nirbharam
eva āvirbhavati sma

original: [15] yatra danujāmitras tu vrīḍātaḥ krīḍātaś ca kiṃcid dūragataḥ sakhi-jana-janita-sukhaṃ nidrāyate sma /
analyzed: yatra danu jāmitraḥ tu vrīḍātaḥ krīḍātaḥ ca kiṃcid dūra gataḥ sakhi jana janita sukham nidrāyate sma

original: [16] atha tasyāṃ niśi diśi diśy api darśita-tamasi rahita-dantagaraḥ kaścij jarada-jagaraḥ sarpaḥ sarpan vrajarāja-caraṇa-rājīvaṃ nijagāra
analyzed: atha tasyām niśi diśi diśi api darśita tamasi rahita danta garaḥ kaścid jarat ajagaraḥ sarpaḥ sarpan vrajarāja caraṇa rājīvam nijagāra

original: [17] tena ca vīryavattayā nigīryamāṇe caraṇe śaraṇecchur vraja-dharaṇīśaḥ santata-kṛṣṇa-sphūrti-pūrti-pracita-cittatayā jāgrad eva kṛṣṇam uddiśya  #
analyzed: tena ca vīryavat tayā nigīryamāṇe caraṇe śaraṇa icchuḥ vraja dharaṇī īśaḥ santata kṛṣṇa sphūrti pūrti pracita citta tayā jāgrat eva kṛṣṇam uddiśya
cukrośa yathā

original: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa bata kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa he
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa bata kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa he
tāta mām ajagaraḥ graseta kim
iti asau smaraṇataḥ tanū janeḥ

original: [18] atha tat-pārśva-vartinaḥ śūra-cakra-vartinaś candra-hāsam ādāya samutthitāś
analyzed: atha tad pārśva vartinaḥ śūra cakravartinaḥ candrahāsam ādāya samutthitāḥ

original: candramasaṃ grasamānaṃ rāhum iva bāhu-śālinas taṃ paśyantaḥ pravyathitā vyarthī-bhūta-tat-prahāra-prayāsās
analyzed: candramasam grasamānam rāhum iva bāhuśālinaḥ tam paśyantaḥ pravyathitāḥ vyarthībhūta tad prahāra prayāsāḥ

original: tad-upāyāntaram apaśyantaś ca vyagratā-kvathitāḥ śarārubhir jvalad-agrodagra-dārubhir jaghnuḥ /
analyzed: tad upāya antaram a paśyantaḥ ca vyagra tā kvathitāḥ śara arubhiḥ jvalat agra udagra dārubhiḥ jaghnuḥ

original: [19] tathāpy atyajati tatrājagare prathama-śabdād eva jāgrad-vrajarāja-tanūjaḥ sura-gaja-rāja iva dhāvaṃs tarhy evājagāma /
analyzed: tathā api atyajati tatra ajagare prathama śabdāt eva jāgrat vraja rāja tanūjaḥ sura gaja rājaḥ iva dhāvan tarhi eva ājagāma

original: [20] āgacchataś ca tasya sa dīrghatara-dīrgha-pṛṣṭhaḥ puccham anu vāṭa-ghaṭita-nyāyena caraṇa-pallava-spṛṣṭatāṃ prāpa /
analyzed: āgacchataḥ ca tasya sa dīrghatara dīrgha pṛṣṭhaḥ puccham anu vāṭa ghaṭita nyāyena caraṇa pallava spṛṣṭa tām prāpa

original: [21] tat-spṛṣṭaś cāyaṃ visṛṣṭa-tac-caraṇaḥ svayam akasmāt sarpākārād utsarpan vapur antaram antareṇa vidyādharākāraṃ dhārayati sma /
analyzed: tad spṛṣṭaḥ ca ayam visṛṣṭa tad caraṇaḥ svayam akasmāt sarpa ākārāt utsarpan vapuḥ antaram antareṇa vidyādhara ākāram dhārayati sma

original: [22] tat-kara-pallava-spṛṣṭa-caraṇāḥ śrī-vraja-rāja-caraṇāś ca yathāvad virājamānatām āpuḥ /
analyzed: tad kara pallava spṛṣṭa caraṇāḥ śrī vrajarāja caraṇāḥ ca yathāvat virājamāna tām āpuḥ

original: [23] tataḥ sāścaryaṃ kṛtāvalokeṣu sarva-lokeṣu sudarśana-nāma-dharaḥ sa tu vidyādhara-caraḥ
analyzed: tatas sa āścaryam kṛta avalokeṣu sarva lokeṣu sudarśana nāma dharaḥ sa tu vidyādhara caraḥ

original: punar-labdha-svarūpa-varas taṃ praśaṃsan sva-śāpa-vṛttāntaṃ śaṃsaṃs tadīyāṃ kṣamām
analyzed: punar labdha sva rūpa varaḥ tam praśaṃsan sva śāpa vṛttāntam śaṃsan tadīyām kṣamām

original: āśaṃsaṃs tad-anujñātaḥ svādhiṣṭhānam eva pratiṣṭhate sma /
analyzed: āśaṃsan tad anujñātaḥ svādhiṣṭhānam eva pratiṣṭhate sma

original: [24] ye pūrvaṃ tatrāpatrapām apahāya śrī-vraja-patipatnī-prabhṛtayaḥ kula-strī-janāḥ kim utānye saṃsṛjyamānatayānusṛtya kṛtya-mūḍhatām anubabhūvuḥ
analyzed: ye pūrvam tatra apatrapām apahāya śrī vraja pati patnī prabhṛtayaḥ kula strī janāḥ kim uta anye saṃsṛjyamāna tayā anusṛtya kṛtya mūḍha tām anubabhūvuḥ

original: [25] samprati tu te yathāyathaṃ mithaḥ samupagūḍhāh kevala-mūḍha-rodanā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: samprati tu te yathāyatham mithas samupagūḍhāḥ ah kevala mūḍha rodanāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: yathā tātaṃ kṛṣṇaś ca rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ ca mātaraḥ /
analyzed: yathā tātam kṛṣṇaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca kṛṣṇam rāmam ca mātaraḥ

original: mātṝś cānyāstathānyo' nyam anye śiśliṣur unmadāḥ //
analyzed: mātṝḥ ca anyāḥ tathā anyaḥ anye śiśliṣuḥ unmadāḥ

original: [26] tad evaṃ kṛta-kṣapaṇāyāṃ kṣapāyāṃ tat-kṣaṇam eva tūrṇa-gamana-manasaḥ samam

original: mat-pramada-satra-vraja-tulya-vrajaḥ parikṣiptatayā vikṣipta-cittaḥ kutra vā vrajiṣyati ?

original: [98] ṛṣis tu tad-abhiprayan prathayati sma-kāmyakataḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi giri-taṭa-gata-gariṣṭhāṭavīm aṭiṣyati /

original: kintu bhavatā yādavānām iva vraja-bhavanānām aritas taniṣyamāṇa-santāpa-santānābhāvāya tad idaṃ cintayiṣyate /
analyzed: kintu bhavatā yādavānām iva vraja bhavanānām aritaḥ taniṣyamāṇa santāpa santāna abhāvāya tat idam cintayiṣyate

original: [99] samprati śaraṇāgatatayā kṛta-mad-anusaraṇānāṃ yādavānām avanāya yuktatayā niyukta ivāsmi /
analyzed: samprati śaraṇa āgata tayā kṛta mad anusaraṇānām yādavānām avanāya yukta tayā niyuktaḥ iva asmi

tanta yadi govardhana dharaṇataḥ

original: gopāye svātma-yogena so æyaṃ me vrata āhitaḥ //[BhP 10.25.18]

original: ity anusṛtya kṛta-rakṣāṇāṃ mat-prāṇāvali-lakṣāṇām iva vrajādhyakṣāṇāṃ yady arayas te ca rayād vighna-nighnatāṃ kariṣyanti /
analyzed: iti anusṛtya kṛta rakṣāṇām mad prāṇa āvali lakṣāṇām iva vraja adhyakṣāṇām yadi arayaḥ te ca rayāt vighna nighna tām kariṣyanti

original: mucukundaṃ ca prati mukundatvaṃ kunda-sundara-danta-kandalita-manda-hāsa-maya-samaya-racana-vacana-vilāsataḥ kṛpām ullāsayiṣyasi /

original: [105] atha punaḥ punar jāta iva sa rājā jarā-jātaḥ pūrva-pūrvavad eva madhupurīm avaruddhānas tad-dhana-hartṝṇāṃ bhartṝn yuṣmān eva pratabhigamiṣyati

original: [106] tataś ca tad-dhanānām avarakṣaṇāya nija-janānāṃ rakṣaṇāya cākṣāma-śyāma-śubhra-vapuṣau

praditsavaḥ vyādha manāṃsi bibhrati
tau vakṣyataḥ rādhikā ādi ārādhikānām kā vārtā

original: [257] sā vakṣyati-mat-pṛṣṭābhis tābhir apy evam ādiṣṭam-
analyzed: sā vakṣyatimat pṛṣṭābhiḥ tābhiḥ api evam ādiṣṭam
yathā sītā devyāḥ daśamukha kṛta ārtiḥ vipad abhūt
yathā vā rukmiṇyāḥ vivahana vidhiḥ cedipa kṛte

original: tathā rādhādīnāṃ para-gṛha-gatir yā bata vipat
analyzed: tathā rādhā ādīnām para gṛha gatiḥ yā bata vipad

original: kathaṃ tasyā nityā sthitir abhimatā hanta suhṛdām //JGc_1,33.106// [*9]
analyzed: katham tasyāḥ nityā sthitiḥ abhimatā hanta suhṛdām

original: [*9] This verse is repeated in Uttara-campū, 31.43.
analyzed: this verse is repeated in uttaracampū

original: [258] tau vakṣyataḥ-atha rādhikādīnām ārtānāṃ kā vārtā ?
analyzed: tau vakṣyataḥ atha rādhikā ādīnām ārtānām kā vārtā
sā vakṣyati

original: deyam adhīnaṃ kārtsnyenābhivyāptyā ca tatra kṛṣṇe svam /
analyzed: deyam adhīnam kārtsnyena abhivyāptyā ca tatra kṛṣṇe svam
tad rūpam racayitvā sa ati pratyaya padāni tāḥ dadhire
tau vakṣyataḥ tāḥ kim sākṣāt anuyuktāḥ
sā vakṣyati atha kim

original: yatas tāsāṃ marma-prakaṭana-karmaṭhatayā mayā pṛṣṭam-bho vipaścitaḥ kāścid evaṃ vadanti /
analyzed: yatas tāsām marma prakaṭana karmaṭha tayā mayā vipaścitaḥ kāścid evam vadanti
tāḥ khalu kṛṣṇe prema mātra akharva sarva svāḥ
premā ca balavat virodhi sadbhāva milat bhaya prayāsa pracchādana paricchada tayā yathā vardhate
na tathā anyathā

original: [262] tarhi kathaṃ tāsām apy anyāsām iva patitayā tat-sampatti-kāmanā-nikāmam antaranuvartata iti ?
analyzed: tarhi katham tāsām api anyāsām iva pati tayā tad sampatti kāmanā nikāmam antar anuvartate iti

original: [263] tad etad ākarṇya pāṭala-paṭala-savarṇa-varṇinyas tā vara-varṇinyas tad idam avarṇayanta /
analyzed: tat etat ākarṇya pāṭala paṭala savarṇa varṇinyaḥ tāḥ varavarṇinyaḥ tat idam avarṇayanta

original: [264] hanta / tāsām eva savirodhas tad-avarodhaḥ sambhavatā-dṛtīyamānā dvitīya-pati-bhāvanā ca,
analyzed: hanta tāsām eva sa virodhaḥ tad avarodhaḥ sambhava tādṛtīyamānā dvitīya pati bhāvanā ca
na punar anyasyāḥ kasyāścid api
yā khalu tad avarodha virodha vāñchā

original: sā vā kathaṃ prema-prathana-mayī syād iti na budhyāmahe /
analyzed: sā vā katham prema prathana mayī syāt iti na budhyāmahe

original: [265] asmākam yadyapy asau pārśva-gato raho-gatas tathāpi tasyāṅghri-yugaṃ navaṃ navam [BhP 1.11.34] ity eva bodha-viṣayo bhavati / kintu-
analyzed: asmākam yadi api asau pārśva gataḥ rahaḥ gataḥ tathā api tasya aṅghri yugam navam navam iti eva bodha viṣayaḥ bhavati kintu
budhi tāḥ paitṛka jana tā
buddhāḥ śvaśura abhimāninaḥ lokāḥ
mānitāḥ sarve pi asmābhiḥ
na mataḥ dharmaḥ tu kena api

original: [266] yad asmākaṃ bālyād eva tasmin nija-rmaṇatā-bhāvanāṃ dūrīkartum āgraham urīkurvanti,
analyzed: yat asmākam bālyāt eva tasmin nijarmaṇa tā bhāvanām dūrīkartum āgraham urīkurvanti
tasmāt asmāt mā sneha peṣam piṇḍhi
kintu sva abhīṣṭam eva viśaṇḍhi
atha tau vakṣyataḥ bhavatyā kim udbhāvitam

original: [268] sā vakṣyati-tato mayā hasitvā śavasitvā ca tābhyaḥ pratyāśā-mātraṃ pratyāsāditam asti /
analyzed: sā vakṣyati tatas mayā hasitvā śavasitvā ca tābhyaḥ pratyāśā mātram pratyāsāditam asti
yadi bhavatoḥ icchā samṛcchate

original: tās tu daivatas tāvan-nija-prāṇa-valalbhasya valalbhatvneālābhāl labdha-mahā-duḥkhās
analyzed: tāḥ tu daivataḥ tāvat nija prāṇa valalbhasya labdha mahā duḥkhāḥ

original: tatra ca svasyānya-hasta-patitatayā jugupsitaṃ-manyatā śuṣkās tatra ca priyāpriya-viprakarṣa-sannikarṣataḥ
analyzed: tatra ca svasya anya hasta patita tayā jugupsitaṃmanya tā śuṣkāḥ tatra ca priya apriya viprakarṣa sannikarṣataḥ

original: prāpta-mano-dharṣās tatra ca nirantaraṃ śaṅkamānaiḥ patiṃ-manyādibhir maṅkṣu maṅkṣu-kṛta-nivāraṇa-bhartsanādi-nikarṣās
analyzed: prāpta manaḥ dharṣāḥ tatra ca nirantaram śaṅkamānaiḥ patiṃmanī ādibhiḥ maṅkṣu maṅkṣu kṛta nivāraṇa bhartsana ādi nikarṣāḥ

original: tatas tata eva ca duḥsaha-preṣṭha-viraha-tīvra-tāpa [BhP 10.29.10] ity ādy-uktatādṛg-avasthābhyo'
analyzed: tatas tatas eva ca duḥsaha preṣṭha viraha tīvra tāpa bhp iti ādi ukta tādṛś avasthābhyaḥ
pi mahā anurāgataḥ pīḍanāt bahula dahana ākāra kārā āgāra vasatiṃmanya tayā nigīrṇa sarva kṣaṇam

original: kṣaṇam api kalpaṃ manvānāḥ samprati tadīya-mahā-viraha-vaha-samayam atītya cātmānaṃ tad-upekṣyatām
analyzed: kṣaṇam api kalpam manvānāḥ samprati tadīya mahā viraha vaha samayam atītya ca ātmānam tad upekṣyatām

original: apy utprekṣya lajjā-mātra-paryavasānam āsajya ca dhik-kṛtaṃ-manyā daśamīm api daśāṃ tanvānāḥ /
analyzed: api utprekṣya lajjā mātra paryavasānam āsajya ca dhikkṛtaṃmanyāḥ daśamīm api daśām tanvānāḥ

original: kiṃ bahunā, bahir-antaḥ-sukumāratāyām api kaumārata eva vyādhānubiddha-snigdha-kānana-pratyāsatty-aparityāgi-mṛgīvat
analyzed: kim bahunā bahis antar sukumāra tāyām api kaumārataḥ eva vyādha anubiddha snigdha kānana pratyāsatti a parityāgi mṛgī vat
prakhara dara apāra para pāra vaśyā labdha vicitra durgati sampluta tayā paśyatām śṛṇvatām

original: api hṛdayaṃ dhunvānā raso' yam iti manyamānena niṣkaruṇa-kautukena kenacid evopekṣituṃ śakyante,
analyzed: api hṛdayam dhunvānāḥ rasaḥ yam iti manyamānena niṣkaruṇa kautukena kenacid evā upekṣitum śakyante
na punar anyena

original: [269] tau sāsraṃ vakṣyataḥ-samprati tāḥ kāṃ gatiṃ matiṃ cāsādayanti ?
analyzed: tau sa asram vakṣyataḥ samprati tāḥ kām gatim matim ca āsādayanti
sā vakṣyati

original: kurvanti maunaṃ krandaṃ vā śūnyaṃ paśyati vartma vā /
analyzed: kurvanti maunam krandam vā śūnyam paśyati vartma vā

original: kṛṣṇaṃ vāñchanti mṛtyuṃ vā tāsām evaṃvidhā gatiḥ //JGc_1,33.109//
analyzed: kṛṣṇam vāñchanti mṛtyum vā tāsām evaṃvidhā gatiḥ

original: [271] punas tau sāsraṃ vakṣyataḥ-samprati tāḥ prati vatsasya kā vidhitsā ?
analyzed: punar tau sa asram vakṣyataḥ samprati tāḥ prati vatsasya kā vidhitsā

original: [272] sā vakṣyati-tad etat paścād api niścīyatām /
analyzed: sā vakṣyati tat etat paścāt api niścīyatām

original: yat khalu preyasāṃ premākṣemaṃ tad-bhāvanāmaya-premānurūpam eva sva-sthemānaṃ labhate /
analyzed: yat khalu preyasām prema akṣemam tad bhāvanā maya prema anurūpam eva sva sthemānam labhate
na tu sva āgraha grahi latām iti

original: [273] tau vakṣyataḥ-manyāmahe tathāpy asmattaḥ saṅkocaṃ rocayiṣyati /
analyzed: tau vakṣyataḥ manyāmahe tathā api asmattaḥ saṅkocam rocayiṣyati

original: [274] sā vakṣyati-bhavatāṃ hṛdi sadā vidyotamānaḥ so' yaṃ tad api vetti,
analyzed: sā vakṣyati bhavatām hṛdi sadā vidyotamānaḥ saḥ yam tat api vetti
tasmāt nitāntam na anyathā kariṣyati

original: kiṃ bahunā, bhavad-āśravam anu sarveṣām eva saṃśravaḥ pratibhāti /
analyzed: kim bahunā bhavat āśravam anu sarveṣām eva saṃśravaḥ pratibhāti
kim uta tasya
tau vakṣyataḥ tarhi garga niṣedha vedhasya kā cikitsā

original: [276] sā sa-hāsaṃ vakṣyati-sa khalu līlā-naiyatyam eva tatratya-doṣatayādhyastavān /
analyzed: sā sa hāsam vakṣyati sa khalu līlā naiyatyam eva tatratya doṣa tayā adhyastavān
sva yajamāna hita samīhita sahita tayā

original: na tu parama-śubha-niveśa-veśa-rūpāṇām āsāṃ kleśa-leśa-praveśadā sadeśatā sambhavati /
analyzed: na tu parama śubha niveśa veśa rūpāṇām āsām kleśa leśa praveśa dā sadeśa tā sambhavati

original: [277] tau vakṣyataḥ-sampraty asmābhiḥ kim iva sopānam upeyam ?
analyzed: tau vakṣyataḥ samprati asmābhiḥ kim iva sopānam upeyam
sā vakṣyati sopānam mayā ca upeyam

original: bhavadbhis tu sarva eva vraja-janā bhojanāya praṇayena nimantrya nimantryantām /
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ tu sarve eva vraja janāḥ bhojanāya praṇayena nimantrya nimantryantām

original: tarhy antaḥ-paṭī-kṣepān naṭīnām ākāra iva tat prakaṭībhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tarhi antar paṭī kṣepāt naṭīnām ākāraḥ iva tat prakaṭībhaviṣyati
tau vakṣyataḥ yathā ājñāpayanti vijñāna ācārya varyāḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tatas tatas

original: [281] ṛṣir uvāca- tataḥ sā pratyakṣata eva tāv abhi bahulam abhivadantī gṛhāya prahāpayiṣyati /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca tatas sā pratyakṣatas eva tau abhi bahulam abhivadantī gṛhāya prahāpayiṣyati

original: [282] atha kathakasya manaḥ-kathā-tataś ca pūrṇimā manasi viviveca-śrī-kṛṣṇa-līlāyām anādi-siddhaṃ śrīmad-bhāgavatam eva mukhyaṃ pramāṇam /
analyzed: atha kathakasya manaḥ kathā tatas ca pūrṇimā manasi viviveca śrī kṛṣṇa līlāyām anādi siddham śrīmat bhāgavatam eva mukhyam pramāṇam

original: [283] tatra yā khalu rāsa-yoge yoga-māyām upāśritaḥ [BhP 10.29.1] ity anena nitya-vyakti-svarūpa-śakti-vṛtti-viśeṣakā yā yogamāyā tan-nirvāhakatayā  #
analyzed: tatra yā khalu rāsa yoge yogamāyām upāśritaḥ iti anena nitya vyakti sva rūpa śakti vṛtti viśeṣakā yā yogamāyā tad nirvāhaka tayā
bādarāyaṇinā samudīritā
sā punar aham eva

original: tatra tena rāsaṃ prakāśaṃ parīkṣit-pariṣadi varṇayitvā tatra prāptam avarṇa-tritayaṃ nirasya rasyatayā samāhitam /
analyzed: tatra tena rāsam prakāśam parīkṣit pariṣadi varṇayitvā tatra prāptam avarṇa tritayam nirasya rasya tayā samāhitam

original: tathā samprati vraje' pi tat-prasaktam iti jñātvā mayāpi samādheyam /
analyzed: tathā samprati vraje tat prasaktam iti jñātvā mayā api samādheyam

original: tatra tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya [BhP 10.33.29] itivad atrāpi yadyapi narakād ānītā ity ādinā tal-lepa-sambhāvanāpayāpitaiva /
analyzed: tatra tejīyasām na doṣāya iti vat atra api yadi api narakāt ānītāḥ iti ādinā tad lepa sambhāvanā apayāpitā eva

original: [284] atha para-dāra-vāra-samāhāra-kāraṇān ācāraś ca yathā gopīnāṃ tat-patīnāṃ ca
analyzed: atha para dāra vāra samāhāra kāraṇān ācāraḥ ca yathā gopīnām tad patīnām ca

original: [BhP 10.33.25] ity anena yaṃ parihāram āpitas tathātrāpi tāś ca na kevalaṃ rāgata
analyzed: iti anena yam parihāram āpitaḥ tathā atra api tāḥ ca na kevalam

original: eva tādṛśīṃ gatim āgatāḥ ity ādinā tāsu tadīya-nityāṅganā-bhāva-vyaṅgataḥ sa ca sāṅgī-kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: eva tādṛśīm gatim āgatāḥ iti ādinā tāsu tadīya nitya aṅganā bhāva vyaṅgataḥ sa ca sa aṅgīkṛtaḥ

original: [285] tathāpi nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya [BhP 10.33.37] itivad asūyābhāsavattayā sambhāvitās tat-patiṃ-manyāḥ samādhātavyāḥ /
analyzed: tathā api na asūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya bhp iti vat asūyā ābhāsavat tayā sambhāvitāḥ tad patiṃmanyāḥ samādhātavyāḥ

original: tac ca tad-rahasyaṃ pūrvaṃ guptam āsīd iti māyā-dvārā yathā-guptaṃ samāhitam /
analyzed: tat ca tat rahasyam pūrvam guptam āsīt iti māyā dvārā yathā guptam samāhitam

original: sāmprataṃ tu vyaktam abhūd iti tathā tad-dvārā vyaktam eva samādheyam /
analyzed: sāmpratam tu vyaktam abhūt iti tathā tad dvārā vyaktam eva samādheyam

original: yena ca sarveṣām api sarva-samādhānam ādheyaṃ bhavitā,
analyzed: yena ca sarveṣām api sarva samādhānam ādheyam bhavitā
anyathā tat tat karaṇam vṛthā param syāt iti

original: [286] atha spaṣṭam ācaṣṭa--[287] ṛṣir uvāca-dināntare tu sarva-nimantraṇāyāṃ yathā-vṛttānte vartite sarvāḥ sādhāraṇa-mahodayāḥ śrī-rādhādayaś  #
analyzed: atha spaṣṭam ṛṣiḥ uvāca dina antare tu sarva nimantraṇāyām yathā vṛttānte vartite sarvāḥ sādhāraṇa mahodayāḥ śrī rādhā ādayaḥ
ca tatra āgamiṣyanti

original: kintu pūrvata eva jana-saṅgīta-vrajeśa-nirmitānaṅgīkāratām ātmano duḥkha-bhaṅgī-saṅgitāṃ maṃsyanta eva /
analyzed: kintu pūrvatas eva jana saṅgīta vraja īśa nirmita anaṅgīkāra tām ātmanaḥ duḥkha bhaṅgī saṅgi tām maṃsyante eva

original: tava ca rūkṣatā-vīkṣaṇena tāḥ sūkṣmāṅgatāṃ gamiṣyanti /
analyzed: tava ca rūkṣa tā vīkṣaṇena tāḥ sūkṣma aṅga tām gamiṣyanti

original: tatra sāmpratam anyāsāṃ svasamāna-kanyānām aṅgīkāreṇa hṛt-kamale' pi bhaṅgitām āpatsyante /
analyzed: tatra sāmpratam anyāsām sva samāna kanyānām aṅgīkāreṇa hṛd kamale pi bhaṅgi tām āpatsyante
tathā ca bhāvī ślokaḥ
dāva trastāḥ mṛga duhitaraḥ candra hīnāḥ cakoryaḥ
srastāḥ vṛkṣān navaka latikāḥ nīra riktāḥ śapharyaḥ
ūrja prāntāt bahis apagatāḥ hanta navya abja nālyaḥ

original: yadvad dṛṣṭā hari-virahitā rādhikādyāś ca tadvat //JGc_1,33.110//
analyzed: yadvat dṛṣṭāḥ hari virahitāḥ rādhikā ādyāḥ ca tadvat

original: [289] tad evaṃ tāsāṃ kṛcchrāyamāṇānām amitābhyamita-tādṛśvarī śrī-vrajeśvarī tu bāṣpa-pūrṇa-nayanā paurṇamāsīṃ nirvarṇayiṣyati /
analyzed: tat evam tāsām kṛcchrāyamāṇānām amita abhyamita tādṛśvarī śrī vrajeśvarī tu bāṣpa pūrṇa nayanā paurṇamāsīm nirvarṇayiṣyati

original: sā tu vadiṣyati-sarve sarvato' py anvicchantu /
analyzed: sā tu vadiṣyati sarve sarvatas pi anvicchantu

original: yathādyatana-nimantraṇataḥ kaścid api na paścimatām añcati /
analyzed: yathā adyatana nimantraṇataḥ kaścid api na paścima tām añcati
kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tatas tatas

original: [291] ṛṣir uvāca-tatas tad-ākarṇana-mātrataḥ sarve sarvato nirvarṇanāya saṅgatya satvaram eva cāgatya yathāvat kathayiṣyanti /
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca tatas tad ākarṇana mātrataḥ sarve sarvatas nirvarṇanāya saṅgatya sa tvaram eva ca āgatya yathāvat kathayiṣyanti

original: teṣu kāścin mahilās tu kiñcid apy aprastutya śrī-rādhikādikāḥ pratyapūrvatāpūrvaṃ drakṣyanti /
analyzed: teṣu kāścid mahilāḥ tu kiñcid api a prastutya śrīrādhikā ādikāḥ pratyapūrva tā apūrvam drakṣyanti
tatas paurṇamāsī vakṣyati kim iva paśyatha

original: kim iva ca kiñcin na kathayatha ?
analyzed: kim iva ca kiñcid na kathayatha
tāḥ vakṣyanti kim iva vakṣyāmaḥ
yatas sarvaiḥ āhatam manyeta
paurṇamāsī vakṣyati tathyam ced kathyatām
mayi kṛṣṇa mātari ca

original: tās tu nīcair vakṣyanti-tatrāpy etāsāṃ rādhikādikānāṃ dhṛta-tulyatā-pūrtiīr apaśyāmaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ tu nīcais vakṣyanti tatra api etāsām rādhikā ādikānām apaśyāmaḥ

original: paurṇamāsī spaṣṭaṃ vakṣyati-anyāś ca punar acchaṃ gacchantu /
analyzed: paurṇamāsī spaṣṭam vakṣyati anyāḥ ca punar accham gacchantu
kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tatas tatas

original: [295] ṛṣir uvāca-tato bahala-kutūhala-vahā bahulā mahilās tatra tatra gatvā jñāta-tādṛśa-tattvāḥ punaḥ paurṇamāsy-ante labdha-sattvās tadvad  #
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca tatas bahala kutūhala vahāḥ bahulāḥ mahilāḥ tatra tatra gatvā jñāta tādṛśa tattvāḥ punar paurṇamāsī ante labdha sattvāḥ tadvat
eva āvartayiṣyanti
vārtā ca eṣā vraja rāja sabhā paryantam paryavasiṣyati

original: vraja-rājaś ca paurṇamāsīm anu tūrṇam āsādya prasādya ca vakṣyati-bhagavati parama-vismāpanam idam asmān bodhaya /
analyzed: vraja rājaḥ ca paurṇamāsīm anu tūrṇam āsādya prasādya ca vakṣyati bhagavati parama vismāpanam idam asmān bodhaya

original: [296] paurṇamāsī vakṣyati-bhavat-kanyā-bhāvābhimāninyām āryāyām idam āścaryaṃ paryavasyati /
analyzed: paurṇamāsī vakṣyati bhavat kanyā bhāva abhimāninyām āryāyām idam āścaryam paryavasyati

original: bhavāṃs tu sarva-vrajasthaṃ strī-puṃsa-vrajam eka-sabhānugataṃ karotu /
analyzed: bhavān tu sarva vraja stham strīpuṃsa vrajam eka sabhā anugatam karotu
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca tatas tatas

original: [298] ṛṣir uvāca-tad etad avadhārya jñāta-kārya-gatinā vraja-bhūpatinā tad-abhihite

yathāsvam labdha rucibhiḥ upāsyantām mahātmabhiḥ
iti śrī śrī gopālacampūm anu
sarvamanorathapūraṇam nāma
trayastriṃśam pūraṇam
kaiśoravilāsaḥ sampūrṇaḥ
sampūritā ca iyam śrī śrī gopāla pūrva campūḥ iti
